title: ChatGPT drives OpenAI toward $1B revenue goal after losing $540M in 2022
description:
OpenAI is poised to surpass the $1 billion revenue mark within the next year, driven by sales of artificial intelligence software and the associated computing capacity, The Information reported on Aug. 29. The AI startup has reportedly seen a substantial boost in its monthly revenue to around $80 million. This marks a significant increase from […]

The post ChatGPT drives OpenAI toward $1B revenue goal after losing $540M in 2022 appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: South Korean Lawmaker Retains Seat Amid Crypto Trading Allegations
description: South Korean National Assembly member Kim Nam-kuk narrowly avoided expulsion over allegations related to cryptocurrency transactions.

title: Pro-Bitcoin Miami Mayor Francis Suarez Drops out of GOP Presidential Candidate Race
description: Francis Suarez, the pro-bitcoin mayor of the U.S. city of Miami, became the first Republican to bow out of the party’s presidential primary race after he announced the suspension of his campaign on Aug. 29. According to some reports, Suarez was forced to suspend his campaign after he failed to make it to the first […]

title: Stronghold company requests the use of tire-derived fuel for crypto mining in Pennsylvania
description: Pennsylvania-based cryptocurrency mining company, Stronghold Digital Mining, is in the process of seeking approval to utilize shredded tires for generating up to 15% of its energy at its Panther Creek plant in Nesquehoning. However, this move is met with opposition from local environmental activists who are gearing up to challenge the initiative. While Stronghold filed ... Read more

title: Avalanche Price Prediction 2023-2032: Time to Buy AVAX?

title: Dogecoin: Elon Musk’s Twitter Acquires Important License to Enable Crypto Payments – Could DOGE Become the Platform’s Native Currency? Detailed Report

title: XRP, BTC Price Expectations Fall Short After Grayscale Drama
description:
Ripple (XRP) and Bitcoin (BTC) have not performed as well as expected, according to a Twitter post shared by lawyer and cryptocurrency enthusiast John E Deaton earlier today. In his post, the lawyer stated that he believed XRP would reach $1 after its victory over the SEC in their very public court case. Most XRP […]

title: Bitfinex Now Features Perpetual Contracts in BNB
